parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the response. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default): Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10. Maximum value: 50.
